author: Undecided with Matt Ferrell
description:
How This Overlooked Battery Might Change Everything. Get an exclusive 15% discount on Saily data plans! Use code UNDECIDED at checkout. Download Saily app or go to https://saily.com/undecided Multiple research teams have recently made breakthroughs in transforming lithium sulfur batteries from stinky stone to capable battery cathode. Some claim they’ve cracked the code — creating prototypes that charge faster than you can finish this video, and others that last 25,000 cycles. That’s basically a forever battery. What changed? And could lithium sulfur actually overthrow lithium ion as the king of batteries?
